ArrowOfTime 0.0.1

predict_the_future

Source: R/predict_the_future.R
predict_the_future.Rd

predict_the_future

predict_the_future(f, data, start_at_nth = 1, ...)

Arguments

f

a function that takes a row-wise subset of data and returns a scalar prediction
data

a data.frame used by f to make predictions. Must contain a column named t which indicates the time of each observation.
start_at_nth

start running the predictions on the nth observation. Useful when predictions on fewer than n observations are known to be unreliable.
...

additional parameters to f

Value

a vector of predictions

Examples

predict_the_future(f = function(t, x) base::mean(x),
                   data = data.frame(t = 1:6, x = 1.3^(1:6)))
#> [1] 1.300000 1.495000 1.729000 2.010775 2.351206 2.763807
